content.raw:
The B case is an old issue related to gazebo lidars not being conform with REP 117 ([gazebo issue 124](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/124/hokuya-laser-sensor-in-drc-sim-should) )  and in addition to that adding noise on top of the max reading. I've never observer C though I think - how frequent does this occur to you? Maybe the GPU lidar has a modulo operation for the max range which causes it to wrap around? But then I'd expect to see it more frequent.

Btw tagging really does not seem to trigger email notifications any longer.
